fields.name: Date_Time
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: Date and time of end of averaging period in ISO8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: Latitude
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the vessel at the time of the end of the averaging period [degree_north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Latitude of the vessel at the time of the end of the averaging period

fields.name: Longitude
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the vessel at the time of the end of the averaging period [degree_east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Longitude of the vessel at the time of the end of the averaging period

fields.name: Tm1
fields.title: Mean Wave period based on the moment of order-1
fields.description: Mean Wave period based on the moment of order-1 [s]

fields.name: T1
fields.title: Mean Wave period based on the first moment
fields.description: Mean Wave period based on the first moment [s]

fields.name: T2
fields.title: Mean Wave period based on the second moment
fields.description: Mean Wave period based on the second moment [s]
